column3: Latest;Phnom Penh:  The Ministry of Health has announced that two Chinese men have escaped isolation and the authorities are looking for them.------Mrs. O Vandin
column4: Secretary of State and Spokesperson of the Ministry of Health
column5: said on the evening of September 9
column7: that the two Chinese men fled a hotel in Phnom Penh. They were passengers from China
column8: who arrived at around 11 am on 8 September.------Ms. O Vandin added that after staying at a hotel in Phnom Penh to wait for the results of the coronavirus test
column9: they had an argument with each other and then ran away from the building. ------Authorities are currently searching for the two men.------UPDATE: The two Chinese nationals have been named as  JIANG JIAJIE
